Material used.Description: Kidney tissue samples were obtained from ARPKD patients.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_000532.4:c.796A>T in ARPKD patient samples.

Biological replicates.Description: Five biological replicates were performed using tissue samples from five different ARPKD patients.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Healthy kidney tissue was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Tissue samples from healthy individuals without the PKHD1 variant were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% in healthy kidney tissue.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 60% in ARPKD patient samples.
